lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The construction industry was likely to engage new workers for the first time since 1980 but they predicted either no rise in employment in the manufactured goods industry or only a slight expansion.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: These three institutes said new jobs would be created mainly in the private services sector and also by the state in the context of job creation measures.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The five leading West German economic research institutes have failed to agree about how strongly the domestic economy will expand this year but revised down forecasts contained in a report published six months ago.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The construction industry was likely to engage new workers for the first time since 1980 but they predicted either no rise in employment in the manufactured goods industry or only a slight expansion.

lst.str: These three institutes said new jobs would be created mainly in the private services sector and also by the state in the context of job creation measures.
